sustainableFinance.title: Access to Sustainable Finance in the Francophonie
sustainableFinance.subtitle: Opportunities offered by development partners

meta.title: Sustainable Finance Day - COP 30 | Climate e-Pavilion
meta.description: Day dedicated to access to sustainable finance in the Francophonie at COP 30 in Belém. Discover opportunities, partners and climate financing mechanisms.

context.title: Context
context.description: The event takes place in a context of intensifying climate financing needs. The Francophonie mobilizes to strengthen capacities for access to available resources, promote endogenous solutions and foster a just, inclusive and resilient transition.
context.project: This day is part of the OIF project 'Support for structural transformations in environmental and climate matters'.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.obj1: Present concrete opportunities offered by development partners in sustainable finance
objectives.obj2: Facilitate dialogue between Francophone institutions, donors and project promoters
objectives.obj3: Showcase best practices in accessing climate and environmental finance
